verses.verse: O foolish <S%G453><s%> Galatians, <S%G1052><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has bewitched <S%G940><s%> you, that you should not obey <S%G3982><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> before <S%G2596><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> has been evidently <S%G4270><s%> set <S%G4270><s%> forth, <S%G4270><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you?

This <S%G5124><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I learn <S%G3129><s%> of you, Received <S%G2983><s%> you the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by the hearing <S%G189><s%> of faith? <S%G4102><s%>
Are you so <S%G3779><s%> foolish? <S%G453><s%> having begun <S%G1728><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> are you now <S%G3568><s%> made <S%G2005><s%> perfect <S%G2005><s%> by the flesh? <S%G4561><s%>
Have <S%G2192><s%> you suffered <S%G3958><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> things in vain? <S%G1500><s%> if <S%G1489><s%> it be yet <S%G2596><s%> in vain. <S%G1500><s%>

He therefore <S%G3767><s%> that ministers <S%G2023><s%> to you the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and works <S%G1754><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, does he it by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by the hearing <S%G189><s%> of faith? <S%G4102><s%>
Even <S%G2531><s%> as Abraham <S%G11><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and it was accounted <S%G3049><s%> to him for righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>
Know <S%G1097><s%> you therefore <S%G686><s%> that they which are of faith, <S%G4102><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> are the children <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

And the scripture, <S%G1124><s%> foreseeing <S%G4275><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> would justify <S%G1344><s%> the heathen <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1537><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> preached <S%G4283><s%> before <S%G4283><s%> the gospel <S%G4283><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> saying, In you shall all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> be blessed. <S%G1757><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> then they which be of faith <S%G4102><s%> are blessed <S%G2127><s%> with faithful <S%G4103><s%> Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

For as many <S%G3745><s%> as are of the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> are under <S%G5259><s%> the curse: <S%G2671><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Cursed <S%G1944><s%> is every <S%G3956><s%> one that continues <S%G1696><s%> not in all <S%G3956><s%> things which <S%G3588><s%> are written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G975><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> them.

But that no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> by the law <S%G3551><s%> in the sight <S%G3844><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> it is evident: <S%G1212><s%> for, The just <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by faith. <S%G4102><s%>
And the law <S%G3551><s%> is not of faith: <S%G4102><s%> but, The man <S%G444><s%> that does <S%G4160><s%> them shall live <S%G2198><s%> in them.

Christ <S%G5547><s%> has redeemed <S%G1805><s%> us from the curse <S%G2671><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> being made <S%G1096><s%> a curse <S%G2671><s%> for us: for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Cursed <S%G1944><s%> is every <S%G3956><s%> one that hangs <S%G2910><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a tree: <S%G3586><s%>

That the blessing <S%G2129><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%> might come <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> that we might receive <S%G2983><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>

Brothers, <S%G80><s%> I speak <S%G3004><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the manner of men; <S%G444><s%> Though <S%G3676><s%> it be but a man's <S%G444><s%> covenant, <S%G1242><s%> yet if it be confirmed, <S%G2964><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> cancels, <S%G114><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> adds <S%G1928><s%> thereto. <S%G1928><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to Abraham <S%G11><s%> and his seed <S%G4690><s%> were the promises <S%G1860><s%> made. <S%G4483><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> not, And to seeds, <S%G4690><s%> as of many; <S%G4183><s%> but as of one, <S%G1520><s%> And to your seed, <S%G4690><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> that the covenant, <S%G1242><s%> that was confirmed <S%G4300><s%> before <S%G4300><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> which was four <S%G5071><s%> hundred <S%G5071><s%> and thirty <S%G5144><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> after, <S%G3326><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> cancel, <S%G208><s%> that it should make <S%G2673><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of none <S%G208><s%> effect. <S%G2673><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> the inheritance <S%G2817><s%> be of the law, <S%G3551><s%> it is no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> of promise: <S%G1860><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G5483><s%> it to Abraham <S%G11><s%> by promise. <S%G1860><s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> serves the law? <S%G3551><s%> It was added <S%G4369><s%> because <S%G5484><s%> of transgressions, <S%G3847><s%> till <S%G891><s%> <S%G3757><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> the promise <S%G1861><s%> was made; <S%G1861><s%> and it was ordained <S%G1299><s%> by angels <S%G32><s%> in the hand <S%G5495><s%> of a mediator. <S%G3316><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> a mediator <S%G3316><s%> is not a mediator of one, <S%G1520><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> is one. <S%G1520><s%>

Is the law <S%G3551><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid: <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> there had been a law <S%G3551><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> given <S%G2227><s%> life, <S%G2227><s%> truly <S%G3689><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> should have been <S%G2258><s%> by the law. <S%G3551><s%>

But the scripture <S%G1124><s%> has concluded <S%G4788><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> that the promise <S%G1860><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> might be given <S%G1325><s%> to them that believe. <S%G4100><s%>

But before <S%G4253><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> we were kept <S%G5432><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> shut <S%G4788><s%> up to the faith <S%G4102><s%> which should <S%G3195><s%> afterwards be revealed. <S%G601><s%>
Why <S%G5620><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> was our schoolmaster <S%G3807><s%> to bring us to Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that we might be justified <S%G1344><s%> by faith. <S%G4102><s%>
But after that faith <S%G4102><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> we are no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a schoolmaster. <S%G3807><s%>
For you are all <S%G3956><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
For as many <S%G3745><s%> of you as have been baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> have put <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

There is neither <S%G3756><s%> Jew <S%G2453><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> Greek, <S%G1672><s%> there is neither <S%G3756><s%> bond <S%G1401><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> free, <S%G1658><s%> there is neither <S%G3756><s%> male <S%G730><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> female: <S%G2338><s%> for you are all <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And if <S%G1487><s%> you be Christ's, <S%G5547><s%> then <S%G686><s%> are you Abraham's <S%G11><s%> seed, <S%G4690><s%> and heirs <S%G2818><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the promise. <S%G1860><s%>
